context: Overview KPIs, Underwrite outputs, Trace
reason: Core valuation anchor used across the app; new wholesalers often confuse it with list price or AIV.

context: Overview KPIs, Underwrite inputs/outputs, Trace
reason: Critical to distressed deals; users need to understand how the engine thinks about current value versus ARV.

context: Sandbox knobs, Underwrite Guardrails / Trace
reason: Global safety clamp on AIV; small knob with big downstream impact that isn’t obvious from the label alone.

context: Underwrite Guardrails, Trace
reason: One of the main offer floors; users need a quick explanation of what inputs drive it versus other floors.

context: Underwrite Guardrails, Trace
reason: Models the minimum “pay off the debt and get them out clean” scenario; useful but not self-explanatory.

context: Overview Guardrails strip, Underwrite Guardrails, Trace
reason: Signature concept in the system; must be explained clearly so teams understand why it’s the lowest acceptable offer.

context: Overview Guardrails, Underwrite MAO bundle, Trace
reason: Defines the investor’s max price; key to understanding the negotiation range between floor and ceiling.

context: Underwrite summary, Overview Strategy, Trace
reason: Core number users care about; tooltip should briefly clarify what costs and margins are baked into MAO.

context: Trace (SPREAD_LADDER), Overview Strategy/Guardrails
reason: Explains how minimum profit spread changes with ARV; important and non-obvious policy concept.

context: Sandbox knobs, Trace SPREAD_LADDER step
reason: Underlying knob for the spread ladder; helpful to show how ARV bands map to required profit.

context: Trace CASH_GATE, Overview Strategy
reason: Determines when a deal is presentable as a ‘cash offer’; non-obvious gate that affects strategy labels.

context: Underwrite outputs, Sandbox knobs (Assignment Fee policies)
reason: Central to wholesale profit; wholesalers need clarity on how this fee is modeled in spreads and MAO.

context: Overview Timeline card, Underwrite timeline section, Trace
reason: Key timeline metric for urgency and strategy; many users won’t know this shorthand without a tooltip.

context: Timeline & Carry card, Sandbox knobs (Carry Months formula/cap)
reason: Represents how long the investor expects to hold the property; affects carrying costs and risk.

context: Market Temp / Timeline sections, Sandbox knobs (Speed Bands)
reason: Summarizes market speed (‘Fast/Neutral/Slow’) per ZIP; important for DTM and strategy but jargon-y.

context: Overview Deal Health, Trace, settings (A/B/C Confidence rubric)
reason: A/B/C style label with a specific rubric; tooltip should explain what makes a deal an A vs C grade.

context: Overview Risk & Compliance card, Trace risk summary, Sandbox gates
reason: Represents on/off rules that can stop a deal; users need a simple explanation of what a gate is.

context: Overview Evidence card, Underwrite evidence banners, settings
reason: Drives stale/missing evidence warnings; tooltip should clarify how ‘fresh’ is defined for comps, title, etc.

context: Risk & Compliance card, Sandbox (Uninsurable Adders), Trace
reason: Major risk flag; users should understand what ‘uninsurable’ means in practice and why it affects offers.

context: Risk & Compliance, Sandbox Compliance & Risk Gates
reason: Common but confusing compliance rule; a short explanation helps avoid surprises on flip/wholetail exits.

context: Risk & Compliance, Sandbox gates (Flood 50% Rule, Repairs structural)
reason: Important for flood-zone rehabs; many users won’t know this rule by name but it heavily affects feasibility.

context: Risk & Compliance, Sandbox gates (FIRPTA Withholding Gate)
reason: Tax/legal concept that’s unfamiliar to most acquisitions reps; needs a concise definition at point of use.

context: Risk & Compliance, Sandbox knobs (PACE handling/detection)
reason: Special financing lien that can surprise teams at closing; tooltip should note that it rides with the property.

context: Risk & Compliance, Sandbox (Condo SIRS/Milestone Flag)
reason: Florida-specific condo structural rules; niche but important enough to justify an inline definition in Risk.

context: Risk & Compliance, Sandbox gate (SCRA Verification Gate)
reason: Legal protection for servicemembers; users should understand why certain foreclosure deals are gated here.

context: /repairs estimator, Trace repairs, Sandbox Repairs Contingency
reason: Light/Medium/Heavy/Structural classification drives contingency and risk; needs a short definition in Repairs.

context: /repairs estimator, Sandbox (Repairs Contingency knobs)
reason: Buffers repair budgets for unknowns; users should know this is an extra cushion, not line-item scope.

context: /repairs QuickEstimate section
reason: Fast per-square-foot estimator; tooltip should clarify it’s a high-level starting point, not a detailed bid.

context: /repairs QuickEstimate and detailed estimator math
reason: Abbreviation that appears in Repairs; many users need a reminder that PSF is a per-square-foot repair rate.

context: /repairs Big 5 section, Repair profiles
reason: Named section in Repairs; tooltip should clarify which systems count as the ‘Big 5’ and why they matter.

context: Sandbox posture selector, settings, Overview/Underwrite posture labels
reason: Global risk dial across the app; users should understand, in one sentence, what changing posture does.

context: /sandbox preset list/save, Sandbox settings
reason: Represents saved sandbox configs; tooltip can explain it’s a named bundle of knobs, not a separate policy.
